JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description    The   Business Intelligence & Analytics team   is looking for an   experienced BI Developer   who is passionate about solving challenging business problems, building applications that provide an excellent user experience.    As a key member of the delivery execution team, candidate would need to create reporting applications for BI and analytics, write maintainable code, reusable components/services/utilities, and test cases. Qualifications include good organizational skills, problem-solving skills, time management skills, ability to work independently and effectively communicate and collaborate with team members. The candidate must be capable of working in all phases of the application system development lifecycle.    The role is for a self-motivated individual with software engineering skills with maturity to collaborate and have an agile mindset.     Responsibilities     Develop BI applications to cater to diverse business needs     Understand problem statements from business and come with design and solutions to address them effectively     Define and develop new reports     Review report usage and content to find opportunities for report consolidation and automation     Take lead on resolving business critical defects on priority     Co-ordinate with other teams such as ETL and UI teams to deploy the solutions successfully in production     Contribute to Innovation and come up new ideas to make the product more business friendly    Qualifications     4+ years of experience in designing and developing BI solutions in reputed companies     Hands on experience in different BI tools such as MicroStrategy and Tableau     Experience in creating wide variety of Reports, Dashboards and Visualizations     Good understanding of database concepts, data warehouse and ETL process     Solid SQL and performance optimization skills     Exposure to Big Data technologies like Hadoop and Hive     Programming experience in Python, Java and shell scripting is preferred     Experience working in Agile environment using Jira or Rally boards     Good listening and communication skills to understand core business problem internal partners are trying to solve     Superior analytical and problem solving skills, with demonstrated intellectual and analytical rigor     Must work well in highly collaborative, matrixed and team oriented environment     Excellent interpersonal skills, strong verbal and written communications skills - capable of developing well-structured communications and presentations
